<file>
00001| "use client"
00002| 
00003| import { QueryClient, QueryClientProvider } from '@tanstack/react-query'
00004| import { ReactQueryDevtools } from '@tanstack/react-query-devtools'
00005| import { useState } from 'react'
00006| 
00007| export function QueryProvider({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) {
00008|   const [queryClient] = useState(() => 
00009|     new QueryClient({
00010|       defaultOptions: {
00011|         queries: {
00012|           staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5 minutes
00013|           retry: (failureCount, error: any) => {
00014|             // Don't retry on 4xx errors
00015|             if (error?.status >= 400 && error?.status < 500) {
00016|               return false
00017|             }
00018|             return failureCount < 2
00019|           },
00020|         },
00021|         mutations: {
00022|           retry: false,
00023|         },
00024|       },
00025|     })
00026|   )
00027| 
00028|   return (
00029|     <QueryClientProvider client={queryClient}>
00030|       {children}
00031|       <ReactQueryDevtools initialIsOpen={false} />
00032|     </QueryClientProvider>
00033|   )
00034| }
</file>
